node.excerpt: I did a cover version of A Spray of Plum Blossoms (一剪梅), which is perhaps better known as Xue Hua Piao Piao Bei Feng Xiao Xiao.  Motivation This oldie Chinese song has become really trending in English-speaking countries, so I thought it’d be cool to…

frontmatter.title: Xue Hua Piao Piao
frontmatter.spoiler: I made a cover song with the virtual singer and my four-year-old daughter.
